editor.label: Application Server - IIS6 CreateWebApplication
editor.description: This procedure creates and starts an in-process web application in the given directory. This procedure assumes that the specified application path exists as a virtual directory.

formElement.label: Application directory:
formElement.documentation: Specify the path within the web site to the application directory (not the physical path). This path must exist on the IIS server.

formElement.label: Host name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name of the IIS server (if the procedure is run on the host itself, use "localhost").

formElement.label: Application name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name for the application.

formElement.label: Internal web site identifier:
formElement.documentation: Provide the numeric internal identifier of the web site. Default is 1
